name: Super Quench Quest!
description:
Created for VimJam3

Play as a robot tasked with putting out fires and the coals that are starting them. However, the fires keep coming and the environment keeps getting hotter! The water you are using to put out the fires is also needed to keep you cool, and more will be used for cooling as the heat rises. You will need to balance quickly taking care of the fires with making sure you have enough water left to get back for a refill.

To play, unzip files and run "Super Quench Quest!.exe"

Game and all assets were created by one person in under 36 total working hours.
